mapper.select: select productId,productCategory,productName,productSize,state,price, to_char(productDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') productDate,amount,color, originalName,saveFileName,filecategory,superProduct, storeName,storeUrl from product where productId=#{productId} and filecategory='list'

select productId,productCategory,productName,productSize,state,price, to_char(productDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') productDate,amount,color, originalName,saveFileName,filecategory,superProduct, storeName,storeUrl from product where productId=#{productId}
mapper.update: update product set productCategory=#{productCategory}, productName=#{productName}, productSize=#{productSize}, price=#{price}, color=#{color}, state=#{state}, fileCategory=#{fileCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, originalName=#{originalName}, saveFileName=#{saveFileName}, superProduct=#{superProduct}, storeName=#{storeName}, storeUrl=#{storeUrl} where productId=#{productId}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT color from product where superProduct=#{superProduct}
select DISTINCT productSize from product where superProduct=#{superProduct}
